header.title: Perform custom airdrop on the {{titleName}} blockchain
header.processing: Processing the custom airdrop file, please wait.

uploadText: To proceed, upload a JSON file containing the custom airdrop data.
uploadText2: The JSON file should contain an array of airdrop recipients:`

table.title: Ticket holders included in the custom airdrop
table.invalid: There are no custom airdrop targets, please re-evaluate the airdrop settings.

options.title: Custom airdrop options
options.assetName: Enter the name of the asset you wish to airdrop
options.tokenQuantity: Enter the quantity of tokens you wish to airdrop

distroRadio.title: How should tokens be allocated to winners?
distroRadio.roundRobin: Allocate whole tokens in a round robin manner

ticketHolder.title: Who should be included in the airdrop?

target.title: What do you want to base this airdrop on?

invalid.title: Nothing to airdrop
invalid.reason: Given there are no valid tickets, there's nothing to airdrop.
invalid.resolution: Adjust the airdrop settings or calculate another airdrop to proceed.

valid.title: Proceed with custom airdrop?
valid.note: Keep in mind the transaction and block size limits when planning batches of airdrops.
valid.single: With a batch limit of {{batchSize}}, 1 batch is required to complete this custom airdrop.
valid.multi: With a batch limit of {{batchSize}}, {{qtyBatches}} batches are required to complete this custom airdrop.
valid.reminder: Keep in mind the transaction and block size limits when planning batches of custom airdrops.
